page.title: 11Ashcott - Past
page.content: {Population}-Since 1945 the population has at least doubled.One inhabitant who has lived in the village since 1898 recalled only 300 people living in the vicinity.Now there are approximately 1200.Mainly young {families}move into the area.There are some old people and young parents and children who occupy most of the newer houses.There are few middle aged and young people. {Developments}-There used to be three shops.Additionally there was a blacksmith,candlemaker,herbalist, saddler and a carpenter.Now only two shops remain,and one is not always open.The village hall,soon to be rebuilt,was the old school.Now,the school built in 1911 is to be closed down to make way for the{modern}school currently being built.
